mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB_POST (CLUB_POST_NO, CLUB_NO, USER_ID, CLUB_POST_TITLE, CLUB_POST_CONTENT, CLUB_POST_VIDEO1, CLUB_POST_VIDEO2, CLUB_POST_VIDEO3, CLUB_POST_REG_DATE, CLUB_POST_UPDATE_DATE, CLUB_POST_HEART_COUNT, CLUB_POST_COMMENT_COUNT, REPORT_CONDITION, DELETE_CONDITION, IMAGE1, IMAGE2, IMAGE3, IMAGE4, IMAGE5, IMAGE6, IMAGE7, IMAGE8, IMAGE9, IMAGE10) VALUES (seq_club_post_no.NEXTVAL, #{clubNo}, #{user.userId}, #{clubPostTitle:VARCHAR}, #{clubPostContent:VARCHAR}, #{clubPostVideo1:VARCHAR}, #{clubPostVideo2:VARCHAR}, #{clubPostVideo3:VARCHAR}, sysdate, null, 0, 0, '0', '0', #{image1:VARCHAR}, #{image2:VARCHAR}, #{image3:VARCHAR}, #{image4:VARCHAR}, #{image5:VARCHAR}, #{image6:VARCHAR}, #{image7:VARCHAR}, #{image8:VARCHAR}, #{image9:VARCHAR}, #{image10:VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT CP.CLUB_POST_NO, CP.CLUB_NO, CP.USER_ID, U.PROFILE_IMAGE, U.NICKNAME, CP.CLUB_POST_TITLE, CP.CLUB_POST_CONTENT, CP.CLUB_POST_VIDEO1, CP.CLUB_POST_VIDEO2, CP.CLUB_POST_VIDEO3, TO_CHAR(CP.CLUB_POST_REG_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일" ""HH24"시 "MI"분 "SS"초"') AS CLUB_POST_REG_DATE, TO_CHAR(CP.CLUB_POST_UPDATE_DATE, '""YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일" ""HH24"시 "MI"분 "SS"초"') AS CLUB_POST_UPDATE_DATE, CP.CLUB_POST_HEART_COUNT, CP.CLUB_POST_COMMENT_COUNT, CP.IMAGE1, CP.IMAGE2, CP.IMAGE3, CP.IMAGE4, CP.IMAGE5, CP.IMAGE6, CP.IMAGE7, CP.IMAGE8, CP.IMAGE9, CP.IMAGE10, HEART_CONDITION, CLUB_ROLE FROM CLUB_POST CP, USERS U, ( SELECT SOURCE_NO AS HEART_CONDITION FROM HEART WHERE TRIM(SOURCE) = '2' AND USER_ID = #{ user.userId } ) V1, ( SELECT member_role AS CLUB_ROLE, USER_ID FROM CLUB_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{ user.userId } AND CLUB_NO = #{ clubNo } ) V2 WHERE CP.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND HEART_CONDITION (+) = CP.CLUB_POST_NO AND V2.USER_ID (+) = U.USER_ID AND CP.CLUB_POST_NO = #{ clubPostNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE CLUB_POST SET DELETE_CONDITION = '1', DELETE_USER_ID = #{ user.userId } WHERE CLUB_POST_NO = #{ clubPostNo }
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, seq_club_post_no.currval AS CLUB_POST_NO, CLUB_NO, USER_ID FROM CLUB_POST WHERE USER_ID = #{ user.userId } AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT CP.CLUB_POST_NO, CP.IMAGE1, CP.CLUB_POST_TITLE, CP.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME, U.PROFILE_IMAGE, CP.CLUB_POST_HEART_COUNT FROM CLUB_POST CP, USERS U, ( SELECT SOURCE_NO AS HEART_CONDITION FROM HEART WHERE TRIM(SOURCE) = '2' AND USER_ID = #{ clubPost.user.userId } ) V1 WHERE CP.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND CP.CLUB_POST_NO = HEART_CONDITION (+) AND CP.USER_ID = #{ userId } AND CP.REPORT_CONDITION = '0' AND CP.DELETE_CONDITION = '0' ORDER BY CP.CLUB_POST_REG_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLUB_POST WHERE USER_ID = #{ userId } AND REPORT_CONDITION = '0' AND DELETE_CONDITION = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY (PAY_NO, USER_ID, CLUB_NO, PAY_PRODUCT, PAY_OPTION, TOTAL_PRICE, PAY_REG_DATE, UPDATE_CLUB_COUNT, UPDATE_CLUB_MEMBER_COUNT, MERCHANT_UID) VALUES (seq_pay_no.NEXTVAL, #{ user.userId }, #{ clubNo }, #{ payProduct }, #{ payOption }, #{ totalPrice }, SYSDATE, #{ updateClubCount:NUMERIC }, #{ updateClubMemberCount:NUMERIC }, #{ merchant_uid } )
mapper.select: SELECT PAY_NO, U.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME, U.PROFILE_IMAGE, CLUB_NO, PAY_PRODUCT, PAY_OPTION, TOTAL_PRICE, PAY_REG_DATE, UPDATE_CLUB_COUNT, UPDATE_CLUB_MEMBER_COUNT, MERCHANT_UID FROM PAY P, USERS U WHERE P.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.USER_ID = #{ userId } ORDER BY PAY_REG_DATE DESC

SELECT PAY_NO, U.USER_ID, U.NICKNAME, U.PROFILE_IMAGE, CLUB_NO, PAY_PRODUCT, PAY_OPTION, TOTAL_PRICE, PAY_REG_DATE, UPDATE_CLUB_COUNT, UPDATE_CLUB_MEMBER_COUNT, MERCHANT_UID FROM PAY P, USERS U WHERE P.USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND PAY_NO = #{ payNo }
